title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 49.1 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 49.1 - Definition

State Regulations

Livestock auction building shall mean every stable, pen, yard, enclosure or structure of any kind used for the housing of domestic
animals for the purpose of public sale by outcry to a bidder, public offering
for sale or exchange or exposing for sale or exchange or publicly selling or
exchanging any domestic animal or domestic fowl as defined in section
107
of the Agriculture and Markets Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
49.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
